name: Coven Run
description:
Kill as many bats as you can and collect their skulls.

Controls

  • Movement - Arrow keys 
  • Fire - Spacebar
  • Gamepad support available

Credits

  • Development - Mad Capacity
  • Art - Kate Prescesky
  • Music - Wizards Assembly: Kevin Choo & Timothonius
  • SFX - ChipTone
